ygData.subject: Re: RE: best place for exp
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Every time I ve been to Sol B, I ve seen more pullers running around looking for kobolds than I have kobolds. Believe it or not, Mistmoore turned out to be
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 25 Feb 2000, Danny Byers wrote:
>
> Get thyself to solb, in the window and/or pool room with a group. dont move
> yourself until you get lvl 46, (when the gks start becoming green). it took
> me all of 4 days to get out of 40 and 45 in the pool room. starting at the
> window room and counting the spawn points up top, there are 14 gk spawns,
> that if are broken properly, you can have nonstop pulling all night. i cant

Every time I've been to Sol B, I've seen more pullers running
around looking for kobolds than I have kobolds.

Believe it or not, Mistmoore turned out to be a pretty good
place for exp at 45 too. Yes, only one in 5 mobs was
blue. But you kill so many mobs so quickly there that I still
made a half bubble in a couple hours. The place is just nuts.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
